item.description: Are you looking for an opportunity to practice your German? Come have Kaffee und Kuchen and talk with us! Ich werde mein Worterbuch mitbringen! Whether you are a native speaker, learned German in Germany or in college, high school or on your own, welcome! It's a great way to retain language skills that would otherwise get very rusty. Please come to have a fun and interesting evening speaking German. Travel around the world through conversation. For this meeting, please tell us-in German-if you have any Easter/Spring/Passover/Equinox family traditions or funny stories. Not everyone RSVP's so there are usually many more people than shown here. Bis dann!
item.how_to_find_us: Look in the back for the table with flags and people sounding funny.
item.name: The West Hartford German Kaffeeklatsch March Meeting
